attributes.action: not to make pay as you go Car Tax law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am on a fixed income with a fixed rate mortgage and I can hardly manage inflation as it is.  I am struggling with all the other taxes and would prefer the car tax to remain as it is.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
